data.message: The 11 Design Principles from Envato Tuts+ form a complete checklist for reviewing compositions: Balance, Unity, Contrast, Emphasis, Repetition, Pattern, Rhythm, Movement, Proportion, Harmony, Variety. Key insight: "Every element must have FUNCTION and PURPOSE." These principles complement the geometric formulas - formulas give you WHERE to place elements, principles tell you WHY and help you evaluate if it's working.
